document_data.name: Volo's Big Book of Space
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Big Book of Space''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It covered [[spelljamming]] and [[spelljammer]]s and navigation in space .

It recommended that the best use of a [[w:c:spelljammer:planetary locator|planetary locator]] was to identify landmarks within a system that could guide a spelljamming traveler to a civilized place where they could buy more reliable [[w:c:spelljammer:star chart|star charts]].
